title: Is Bronze really like this or is it just on PBE?
body:
So on PBE I'm in Bronze II right now (my only time ever seeing Bronze in any form) and I had to support a Jinx who would blow her summoner heal all willy nilly when no enemies were around, stood there auto attacking minions and missing so much CS, and cursing at team mates who would "steal her kills".

Is..is this what Bronze is actually like or is PBE just especially bad? Because if this is what Bronze is like on Live.. then.. oh my god.. I..I had no idea.
